channel.title: Comments on: Episode 25 – Single-Handedly Fixing New Year’s Resolutions and 2013 Tech Predictions!
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: BlackBerry May Be Separating Messenger from Company Ahead of Potential Sale - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: BlackBerry May Be Separating Messenger from Company Ahead of Potential Sale - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.description: […] may now be being chopped off and sold as a separate company. This isn’t surprising since BlackBerry has been in a slow death-spiral for the past couple of years. While bringing BlackBerry Messenger to other platforms like Android, Windows Phone and the iPhone […]
item.content:encoded: […] may now be being chopped off and sold as a separate company. This isn’t surprising since BlackBerry has been in a slow death-spiral for the past couple of years. While bringing BlackBerry Messenger to other platforms like Android, Windows Phone and the iPhone […]

item.title: By: Jesso
item.dc:creator: Jesso
item.description: Also: If you're trying to make or break a habit, Habit Streak is a good app. I have the "Pro" version on my (Android) phone, and basically it asks you every morning "Did you do [insert habit here] yesterday?" and you tell it yes or no. It keeps track of how many days in a row you've kept up the habit, and shows you that number so that you want to not break your winning streak. There are a bunch of apps that do this in various ways, but this is my favorite.
item.content:encoded: Also: If you’re trying to make or break a habit, Habit Streak is a good app. I have the “Pro” version on my (Android) phone, and basically it asks you every morning “Did you do [insert habit here] yesterday?” and you tell it yes or no. It keeps track of how many days in a row you’ve kept up the habit, and shows you that number so that you want to not break your winning streak. There are a bunch of apps that do this in various ways, but this is my favorite.

item.title: By: Jesso
item.dc:creator: Jesso
item.description:
My Fitness Pal! I'm on there as Jess0 if you want to be friends. It's really handy, and I love the "If every day were like today" thingy that is shows you at the end of the day.
I also set up a reminder in Tasker so that it makes a notification pop up around each meal time to remind me to log my food. The notification pops up, I open my notification area thingy and tap it, and it takes me to the app. I'm very forgetful, so Tasker is my friend.
item.content:encoded:
My Fitness Pal! I’m on there as Jess0 if you want to be friends. It’s really handy, and I love the “If every day were like today” thingy that is shows you at the end of the day.

I also set up a reminder in Tasker so that it makes a notification pop up around each meal time to remind me to log my food. The notification pops up, I open my notification area thingy and tap it, and it takes me to the app. I’m very forgetful, so Tasker is my friend.
